00039     public HibernateDatabaseSnapshot(HibernateDatabase database) throws JDBCException {
00040         try {
00041             Configuration cfg = database.createConfiguration();
00042             cfg.configure(database.getConfigFile());
00043             this.database = database;
00044 
00045 //            Dialect dialect = (Dialect) Class.forName(cfg.getProperty("dialect")).newInstance();
00046 //            dialect.
00047             Dialect dialect = new HibernateGenericDialect(cfg.getProperty("dialect"));
00048             cfg.buildMappings();
00049             Mapping mapping = cfg.buildMapping();
00050 
00051 //            Dialect dialect = new MySQL5InnoDBDialect();
00052 
00053             Iterator tableMappings = cfg.getTableMappings();
00054             while (tableMappings.hasNext()) {
00055                 org.hibernate.mapping.Table hibernateTable = (org.hibernate.mapping.Table) tableMappings.next();
00056                 if (hibernateTable.isPhysicalTable()) {
00057                     Table table = new Table(hibernateTable.getName());
00058                     System.out.println("seen table " + table.getName());
00059 
00060                     tablesMap.put(table.getName(), table);
00061 
00062                     Iterator columnIterator = hibernateTable.getColumnIterator();
00063                     while (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00064                         org.hibernate.mapping.Column hibernateColumn = (org.hibernate.mapping.Column) columnIterator.next();
00065                         Column column = new Column();
00066                         column.setName(hibernateColumn.getName());
00067 //todo:                        column.setAutoIncrement(hibernateColumn.);
00068                         column.setDataType(hibernateColumn.getSqlTypeCode(mapping));
00069                         if (column.isNumeric()) {
00070                             column.setColumnSize(hibernateColumn.getPrecision());
00071                         } else {
00072                             column.setColumnSize(hibernateColumn.getLength());
00073                         }
00074                         column.setDecimalDigits(hibernateColumn.getScale());
00075                         column.setDefaultValue(hibernateColumn.getDefaultValue());
00076                         column.setNullable(hibernateColumn.isNullable());
00077                         column.setPrimaryKey(isPrimaryKey(hibernateTable, hibernateColumn));
00078                         column.setTable(table);
00079                         column.setTypeName(hibernateColumn.getSqlType(dialect, mapping).replaceFirst("\\(.*\\)", ""));
00080                         column.setUnique(hibernateColumn.isUnique());
00081                         column.setCertainDataType(false);
00082 
00083                         columnsMap.put(table.getName() + "." + column.getName(), column);
00084                         table.getColumns().add(column);
00085                     }
00086 
00087                     Iterator indexIterator = hibernateTable.getIndexIterator();
00088                     while (indexIterator.hasNext()) {
00089                         org.hibernate.mapping.Index hibernateIndex = (org.hibernate.mapping.Index) indexIterator.next();
00090                         Index index = new Index();
00091                         index.setTable(table);
00092                         index.setName(hibernateIndex.getName());
00093                         columnIterator = hibernateIndex.getColumnIterator();
00094                         while (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00095                             org.hibernate.mapping.Column hibernateColumn = (org.hibernate.mapping.Column) columnIterator.next();
00096                             index.getColumns().add(hibernateColumn.getName());
00097                         }
00098 
00099                         indexes.add(index);
00100                     }
00101 
00102                     Iterator uniqueIterator = hibernateTable.getUniqueKeyIterator();
00103                     while (uniqueIterator.hasNext()) {
00104                         org.hibernate.mapping.UniqueKey hiberateUnique = (org.hibernate.mapping.UniqueKey) uniqueIterator.next();
00105 
00106                         Index index = new Index();
00107                         index.setTable(table);
00108                         index.setName(hiberateUnique.getName());
00109                         columnIterator = hiberateUnique.getColumnIterator();
00110                         while (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00111                             org.hibernate.mapping.Column hibernateColumn = (org.hibernate.mapping.Column) columnIterator.next();
00112                             index.getColumns().add(hibernateColumn.getName());
00113                         }
00114                         indexes.add(index);
00115                     }
00116 
00117                     org.hibernate.mapping.PrimaryKey hibernatePrimaryKey = hibernateTable.getPrimaryKey();
00118                     if (hibernatePrimaryKey != null) {
00119                         PrimaryKey pk = new PrimaryKey();
00120                         pk.setName(hibernatePrimaryKey.getName());
00121                         pk.setTable(table);
00122                         for (Object hibernateColumn : hibernatePrimaryKey.getColumns()) {
00123                             pk.getColumnNamesAsList().add(((org.hibernate.mapping.Column) hibernateColumn).getName());
00124                         }
00125                         primaryKeys.add(pk);
00126                     }
00127 
00128                 }
00129             }
00130 
00131             this.tables = new HashSet<Table>(tablesMap.values());
00132             this.columns = new HashSet<Column>(columnsMap.values());
00133 
00134             tableMappings = cfg.getTableMappings();
00135             while (tableMappings.hasNext()) {
00136                 org.hibernate.mapping.Table hibernateTable = (org.hibernate.mapping.Table) tableMappings.next();
00137                 if (hibernateTable.isPhysicalTable()) {
00138 
00139                     Iterator fkIterator = hibernateTable.getForeignKeyIterator();
00140                     while (fkIterator.hasNext()) {
00141                         org.hibernate.mapping.ForeignKey hibernateForeignKey = (org.hibernate.mapping.ForeignKey) fkIterator.next();
00142                         if (hibernateForeignKey.getTable() != null
00143                                 && hibernateForeignKey.getReferencedTable() != null
00144                                 && hibernateForeignKey.isPhysicalConstraint()) {
00145                             ForeignKey fk = new ForeignKey();
00146                             fk.setName(hibernateForeignKey.getName());
00147                             fk.setForeignKeyTable(getTable(hibernateForeignKey.getTable().getName()));
00148                             List<String> fkColumns = new ArrayList<String>();
00149                             for (Object column : hibernateForeignKey.getColumns()) {
00150                                 fkColumns.add(((org.hibernate.mapping.Column) column).getName());
00151                             }
00152                             fk.setForeignKeyColumns(StringUtils.join(fkColumns, ", "));
00153 
00154                             fk.setPrimaryKeyTable(getTable(hibernateForeignKey.getReferencedTable().getName()));
00155 
00156                             fkColumns = new ArrayList<String>();
00157                             for (Object column : hibernateForeignKey.getReferencedColumns()) {
00158                                 fkColumns.add(((org.hibernate.mapping.Column) column).getName());
00159                             }
00160                             if (fkColumns.size() == 0) {
00161                                 for (Object column : hibernateForeignKey.getReferencedTable().getPrimaryKey().getColumns()) {
00162                                     fkColumns.add(((org.hibernate.mapping.Column) column).getName());
00163                                 }
00164                             }
00165                             fk.setPrimaryKeyColumns(StringUtils.join(fkColumns, ", "));
00166 //todo                            fk.setDeferrable(hibernateForeignKey.);
00167 //todo                            fk.setInitiallyDeferred();
00168                             foreignKeys.add(fk);
00169                         }
00170 
00171                     }
00172 
00173 //                    script.add(
00174 //                            table.sqlCreateString(
00175 //                                    dialect,
00176 //                                    mapping,
00177 //                                    defaultCatalog,
00178 //                                    defaultSchema
00179 //                                )
00180 //                        );
00181 //                    Iterator comments = table.sqlCommentStrings( dialect, defaultCatalog, defaultSchema );
00182 //                    while ( comments.hasNext() ) {
00183 //                        script.add( comments.next() );
00184 //                    }
00185                 }
00186             }
00187         } catch (Exception e) {
00188             throw new JDBCException(e);
00189         }
00190     }

00192     private boolean isPrimaryKey(org.hibernate.mapping.Table hibernateTable, org.hibernate.mapping.Column hibernateColumn) {
00193         org.hibernate.mapping.PrimaryKey key = hibernateTable.getPrimaryKey();
00194         if (key == null) {
00195             return false;
00196         }
00197         Iterator columnIterator = key.getColumnIterator();
00198         while (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00199             if (columnIterator.next().equals(hibernateColumn)) {
00200                 return true;
00201             }
00202         }
00203         return false;
00204     }

00214     public Set<View> getViews() {
00215         return new HashSet<View>();
00216     }
00217 
00218     public Column getColumn(Column column) {
00219         if (column.getTable() == null) {
00220             return getColumn(column.getView().getName(), column.getName());
00221         } else {
00222             return getColumn(column.getTable().getName(), column.getName());
00223         }
00224     }
00225 
00226     public Column getColumn(String tableName, String columnName) {
00227         String tableAndColumn = tableName + "." + columnName;
00228         Column returnColumn = columnsMap.get(tableAndColumn);
00229         if (returnColumn == null) {
00230             for (String key : columnsMap.keySet()) {
00231                 if (key.equalsIgnoreCase(tableAndColumn)) {
00232                     return columnsMap.get(key);
00233                 }
00234             }
00235         }
00236         return returnColumn;
00237     }
00238

00260     public Table getTable(String tableName) {
00261         for (Table table : getTables()) {
00262             if (table.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(tableName)) {
00263                 return table;
00264             }
00265         }
00266         return null;
00267     }
00268 
00269     public ForeignKey getForeignKey(String foreignKeyName) {
00270         for (ForeignKey fk : getForeignKeys()) {
00271             if (fk.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(foreignKeyName)) {
00272                 return fk;
00273             }
00274         }
00275         return null;
00276     }

00280             if (sequence.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(sequenceName)) {
00281                 return sequence;
00282             }
00283         }
00284         return null;

00301     public View getView(String viewName) {

00310     public PrimaryKey getPrimaryKey(String pkName) {
